title: Stores or shops for the conduct of retail business
clause_text: Stores or shops for the conduct of retail business. There will, however, be no storage or sale of combustible material except with the Commissioner's permission.
section: Additional facilities in the Development in Large Holding/layout

source_pdf.text_snippet: Stores or shops for the conduct of retail business. There will, however, be no storage or sale of combustible material except with the Commissioner's permission.
